Rich,

What do you use for an email program?  

I put in the kanji using MS language tools, then as I upload the email, Outlook Express pops up a window asking how do I want it sent.  I select UNICODE, and it seems to work.

David
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Turner 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2005 10:53 PM
  Subject: [nihontostudy] Slightly off topic


  greetings all. I have tried to use Kanji in Yahoo email before but it 
  fails every time. is there a trick to getting it to work ???.

  cheers

  Rich
